topics.body:
To any and all anime elitists/purists in the thread. You may not want to read what I am about to post. That being said I will not apologize for it.


[spoiler]The CGI sequences on Show by Rock are actually really well done and are arguably one of the best parts of the series so far.[/spoiler]
